issue.title: [CF 323] Lua error of r283
issue.body:
When you right click the icon to open editor get this error.

2x TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r283.lua:2399: attempt to call global "linenum" (a nil value)
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r283.lua:2399: in function <TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:2398>
<in C code>
<string>:"*:OnMouseUp":5: in function <string>:"*:OnMouseUp":1
